name: The Foody Snake
description:
This is the first game jam we have participated. We learnt a lot of things from this game jam.

The Foody Snake is a 2d game in which after eating a food the snake will grow. You can pick powerup and make a snake  immortal for a certain amount of time.

Controls : Use Arrow Keys(← ↑ ↓ →) to control the Snake.

Caution : Don't eat yourself ;)
